tool_description: Aggregates processed feedback data from multiple sources and generates comprehensive metrics, statistics, and insights across different dimensions.

feedback_sources.description: Array identifying the source of each feedback item

sentiment_scores.description: Array of sentiment scores for each feedback item

topic_assignments.description: Array of topic categories for each feedback item

timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for each feedback item

ratings.description: Array of numerical ratings if available

aggregation_period.description: Time period for aggregation (daily, weekly, monthly)

include_temporal_trends.description: Whether to include time-based trend analysis

minimum_sample_size.description: Minimum number of feedback items required per aggregation bucket (1-50)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All input arrays must have the same length
Empty input data: At least one feedback item must be provided
Invalid aggregation period: Must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly]
Invalid confidence level: Value must be between 0.8 and 0.99
Invalid minimum sample size: Value must be between 1 and 50
Insufficient data: Not enough feedback items to generate reliable aggregated metrics
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 date-time strings
usage: Provide arrays of feedback sources, sentiment scores, topic assignments, and timestamps. Optionally include ratings and configure aggregation settings. The tool generates comprehensive aggregated analytics.

total_feedback_count.description: Total number of feedback items processed

overall_sentiment_score.description: Average sentiment score across all feedback

source_distribution.description: Breakdown of feedback volume by source

top_topics.description: Most frequently mentioned topics in order of prevalence

sentiment_by_source.description: Average sentiment scores for each feedback source

aggregation_summary.description: Executive summary of aggregated feedback insights
